hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
if [ ! -d "B2G" ]; then git clone git://github.com/mozilla-b2g/B2G.git fi
cd B2G
#rm -rf out rm -f gaia/profile.tar.gz #rm -rf objdir-gecko ./config.sh emulator-x86 ./build.sh
rm -rf b2g-distro mkdir -p b2g-distro/out/target/product/generic mkdir -p b2g-distro/prebuilts/qemu-kernel/arm mkdir -p b2g-distro/out/host/linux-x86/bin mkdir -p b2g-distro/out/host/linux-x86/usr/share/pc-bios mkdir -p b2g-distro/development/tools/emulator/skins mkdir -p b2g-distro/marionette-client cp .config b2g-distro cp load-config.sh b2g-distro cp run-emulator.sh b2g-distro cp out/host/linux-x86/bin/emulator b2g-distro/out/host/linux-x86/bin cp out/host/linux-x86/bin/emulator-arm b2g-distro/out/host/linux-x86/bin cp out/host/linux-x86/bin/adb b2g-distro/out/host/linux-x86/bin cp prebuilts/qemu-kernel/arm/kernel-qemu-armv7 b2g-distro/prebuilts/qemu-kernel/arm cp -R out/target/product/generic_x86 b2g-distro/out/target/product cp -R development/tools/emulator/skins b2g-distro/development/tools/emulator cp -R gecko/testing/marionette/client b2g-distro/marionette-client #cp -R out/host/linux-x86/usr/share/pc-bios b2g-distro/out/host/linux-x86/usr/share
zip -r ../package.zip b2g-distro/ echo "BUILD SUCCEEDED"
